tool_description: Analyzes hair characteristics to determine hair type, texture, porosity, and density based on user responses to standardized questions.

curl_pattern.description: Hair curl pattern: straight, wavy, curly, or coily

hair_thickness.description: Individual strand thickness: fine, medium, or thick

hair_density.description: Amount of hair on scalp: low, medium, or high

porosity_test_result.description: Water absorption rate: low, medium, or high porosity

elasticity_test_result.description: Hair stretch and bounce back: low, medium, or high elasticity

error_messages: Invalid curl pattern: Must be one of [straight, wavy, curly, coily]
Invalid thickness: Must be one of [fine, medium, thick]
Invalid density: Must be one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid porosity: Must be one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid elasticity: Must be one of [low, medium, high]
usage: Answer questions about your hair's natural curl pattern, strand thickness, overall density, porosity (how quickly it absorbs water), and elasticity (stretch without breaking).

care_recommendations.description: Basic care tips for this hair type
